short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alternate CSS for Hacker News with a focus on typography and readability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Alternate CSS for Hacker News with a focus on typography and readability. Now with Dark Mode!

Features

- ✅ Light mode
- ✅ Dark mode
- ✅ Automatic light/dark mode based on system preference
- ✅ Cloud sync

README: https://github.com/deevus/georgify-plus
